snippet: Clashes this week between competing factions of the Pakistani Taliban in northwest Pakistan left more than 20 fighters dead, intelligence officials and militant commanders said Friday.
abstract: Clashes between competing factions of the Pakistani Taliban in northwest Pakistan leave more than 20 fighters dead.
lead_paragraph: Clashes this week between competing factions of the Pakistani Taliban in northwest Pakistan left more than 20 fighters dead, intelligence officials and militant commanders said Friday.
